named-query.name: PRODUCT_BUNDLE_BY_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM ProductBundleImpl AS p WHERE p.code = ?1

named-query.name: PRODUCT_BUNDLE_ALL
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM ProductBundleImpl AS p

named-query.name: PRODUCT_BUNDLE_BY_GUIDS
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM ProductBundleImpl AS p WHERE p.code in (:list)

named-query.name: FIND_BUNDLES_BY_PRODUCT_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT pb FROM ProductBundleImpl AS pb, IN(pb.constituentsInternal) bc WHERE bc.productConstituent.code = ?1

named-query.name: FIND_BUNDLES_BY_PRODUCT_SKU_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT pb FROM ProductBundleImpl AS pb, IN(pb.constituentsInternal) bc WHERE bc.skuConstituent.skuCodeInternal = ?1

named-query.name: FIND_BUNDLE_IDS_BY_CONSTITUENT_PRODUCT_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT pb.uidPk, pb.code FROM ProductBundleImpl AS pb, IN(pb.constituentsInternal) bc WHERE bc.productConstituent.code = ?1

named-query.name: FIND_BUNDLE_IDS_BY_CONSTITUENT_PRODUCT_SKUS
named-query.query: SELECT pb.uidPk, pb.code FROM ProductBundleImpl AS pb, IN(pb.constituentsInternal) bc WHERE bc.skuConstituent.skuCodeInternal IN (:list)

named-query.name: PRODUCT_BUNDLE_BY_CONSTITUENT_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM ProductBundleImpl p INNER JOIN p.constituentsInternal b WHERE b.guid = ?1

named-query.name: PRODUCT_BUNDLE_EXISTS
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(p.uidPk) FROM ProductBundleImpl AS p WHERE p.code = :code

named-query.name: PRODUCT_BUNDLE_UID_BY_SKUCODE
named-query.query: SELECT pb.uidPk FROM ProductBundleImpl AS pb, ProductSkuImpl AS sku WHERE sku.skuCodeInternal = :skuCode AND pb.uidPk = sku.productInternal.uidPk

named-query.name: PRODUCT_BUNDLE_CONSTITUENT_BY_BUNDLE_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT bc FROM ProductBundleImpl AS pb, IN(pb.constituentsInternal) bc WHERE pb.code = ?1

named-query.name: PRODUCT_BUNDLE_CONSTITUENT_BY_BUNDLE_CODE_AND_CONSTITUENT_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT bc FROM ProductBundleImpl AS pb, IN(pb.constituentsInternal) bc WHERE pb.code = ?1 AND bc.productConstituent.code = ?2

named-query.name: PRODUCT_BUNDLE_AS_CONSTITUENT
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM BundleConstituentImpl AS p WHERE p.productConstituent.code = ?1

named-query.name: PRODUCT_BUNDLE_UID_SELECT_BY_CONSTITUENT_UIDS
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT p.uidPk FROM ProductBundleImpl p INNER JOIN p.constituentsInternal c WHERE c.productConstituent.uidPk IN (:list)
